title: "Recreation of the periodic table with an unsupervised machine learning algorithm"
excerpt: "The periodic table is a tabular arrangement of elements such that the periodic patterns of their physical and chemical properties are clearly understood. The prototype of the current periodic table was first presented by Mendeleev in 1869 1."
